mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PROJECT (PROJECT_NM, INSTT_CODE, BGNDE, ENDDE, PM, TRANSPORT_CT, REG_DATETIME, UPD_DATETIME, REG_ID, UPD_ID, NOTE, TEMP_COLUM) VALUES (#{PROJECT_NM}, #{INSTT_CODE}, #{BGNDE}, #{ENDDE}, #{PM}, #{TRANSPORT_CT}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), NULL, #{REG_ID}, NULL, "", "")
mapper.select: SELECT A.PROJECT_NO , A.PROJECT_NM , A.INSTT_CODE , A.BGNDE , A.ENDDE , CONCAT(date_format(A.BGNDE,'%Y-%m-%d'), "~" , date_format(A.ENDDE,'%Y-%m-%d')) AS TERM , A.PM , B.NAME AS PM_NAME , A.TRANSPORT_CT , A.REG_DATETIME , A.UPD_DATETIME , A.REG_ID , A.UPD_ID , C.CODE_NAME AS INSTT_NAME FROM TB_PROJECT AS A LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER AS B ON B.MEMBER_NO = A.PM LEFT JOIN TB_CODE AS C ON C.CODE_ID = A.INSTT_CODE WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{PROJECT_NO}

SELECT A.PROJECT_NO , A.PROJECT_NM , A.INSTT_CODE , A.BGNDE , A.ENDDE , CONCAT(date_format(A.BGNDE,'%Y-%m-%d'), "~" , date_format(A.ENDDE,'%Y-%m-%d')) AS TERM , A.PM , B.NAME AS PM_NAME , A.TRANSPORT_CT , A.REG_DATETIME , A.UPD_DATETIME , A.REG_ID , A.UPD_ID , C.CODE_NAME AS INSTT_NAME FROM TB_PROJECT AS A LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER AS B ON B.MEMBER_NO = A.PM LEFT JOIN TB_CODE AS C ON C.CODE_ID = A.INSTT_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND STR_TO_DATE(#{SELDATE}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(BGNDE,'%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{SELDATE}, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(ENDDE,'%Y-%m-%d')
AND BGNDE like CONCAT('',#{SELYEAR},'%')
ORDER BY BGNDE DESC

SELECT A.PROJECT_NO , A.PROJECT_NM , A.INSTT_CODE , A.BGNDE , A.ENDDE , CONCAT(date_format(A.BGNDE,'%Y-%m-%d'), "~" , date_format(A.ENDDE,'%Y-%m-%d')) AS TERM , A.PM , B.NAME AS PM_NAME , A.TRANSPORT_CT , A.REG_DATETIME , A.UPD_DATETIME , A.REG_ID , A.UPD_ID , C.CODE_NAME AS INSTT_NAME FROM TB_PROJECT AS A LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER AS B ON B.MEMBER_NO = A.PM LEFT JOIN TB_CODE AS C ON C.CODE_ID = A.INSTT_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND A.INSTT_CODE = ( SELECT CODE_ID FROM TB_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = #{SELINSTT} )
AND A.PM = ( SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{SELMEMBER} )
ORDER BY BGNDE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PROJECT_MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, PROJECT_NO, INPT_BGNDE, INPT_ENDDE, ROLE_CODE, CHRG_JOB, USE_LANG, REG_DATETIME, UPD_DATETIME, REG_ID, UPD_ID, NOTE, TEMP_COLUM) VALUES (#{MEMBER_NO}, #{PROJECT_NO}, #{INPT_BGNDE}, #{INPT_ENDDE}, #{ROLE_CODE}, #{CHRG_JOB}, #{USE_LANG}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), NULL, #{REG_ID}, NULL, "", "")
mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_NO , A.PROJECT_NO , A.INPT_BGNDE , A.INPT_ENDDE , A.ROLE_CODE , A.CHRG_JOB , A.USE_LANG , A.REG_DATETIME , A.UPD_DATETIME , A.REG_ID , A.UPD_ID , A.NOTE , A.TEMP_COLUM , B.CODE_NAME AS ROLE_NAME , C.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME FROM TB_PROJECT_MEMBER AS A LEFT JOIN TB_CODE AS B ON A.ROLE_CODE = B.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER AS C ON A.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO WHERE A.PROJECT_NO = #{PROJECT_NO} ORDER BY MEMBER_NO ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_PROJECT_MEMBER WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{PROJECT_NO} AND MEMBER_NO = #{MEMBER_NO}
mapper.select: SELECT PROJECT_NO, PROJECT_NM FROM TB_PROJECT WHERE DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') >= BGNDE AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') <= ENDDE
SELECT PROJECT_NO FROM TB_PROJECT_MEMBER WHERE DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') >= INPT_BGNDE AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') <= INPT_ENDDE

SELECT * FROM TB_PROJECT_MEMBER WHERE TB_PROJECT_MEMBER.PROJECT_NO IN (SELECT PROJECT_NO FROM TB_PROJECT WHERE 1=1
AND STR_TO_DATE(#{SELDATE}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(BGNDE,'%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{SELDATE}, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(ENDDE,'%Y-%m-%d'))
AND BGNDE like CONCAT('',#{SELYEAR},'%'))
)
